message.raw:
Removed shortcut, renamed icon file, retamed main file to __main__.pyw,
to conform with requirements of the new installer.

Added qtutils resource file and used it for app icon

Increased available resolutions in .ico file.

Added code to setup taskbar stuff correctly, with icon, pinning, relaunching,
the whole shebang.
